full_summary:
**Digital Thursday Product**
================================

*Tender Reference : PW-23-01023046*

### Tender Overview

The Atlantic Canada Opportunities Agency (ACOA) invites qualified contractors to submit proposals for the development of an innovative digital product. The product is designed to serve as an onboarding tool for new staff and a resource for staff to build their digital capacity.

### Regions of Opportunity and Delivery

The tender opportunity is open to contractors in the provinces of Newfoundland and Labrador, New Brunswick, Nova Scotia, and Prince Edward Island.

### Key Requirements

The successful contractor will be responsible for developing a digital product that incorporates various contents from ACOA's Digital Transformation Bootcamp and Digital Thursday initiatives. The product must be able to support the onboarding of new staff and enhance the digital capacity of existing staff.

### Tender Documentation

The tender documentation consists of the following attachments:

* **Request for Proposal (RFP)** : [attachment link]
* **Addendum 1** : [attachment link]

### Contact Information

To obtain further information about this tender opportunity, please contact Mathieu Roy at:

*   Name : Roy, Mathieu
*   Email : [Mathieu.Roy@acoa-apeca.gc.ca](mailto:Mathieu.Roy@acoa-apeca.gc.ca)
*   Phone : 506-961-4247

### Tender Submission

The tender submission deadline is **February 17, 2023, at 11:00:00 AM**. Electronic tender submissions must be made through the Canada Buys website.

Note: You may need to format date in your submission. 

Submission Guidelines
--------------------

Tender submissions must be made electronically through the Canada Buys website. Please ensure that your submission is received by the specified deadline to be considered. Late submissions will not be accepted. [1](bit.ly/ImpactOfLateSubmissions)
